summary: Unable to ftp Quicken file from link
description:
From Bugzilla Helper:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.0rc1)
Gecko/20020417
BuildID:    2002041711

On the referenced URL, step 1 contains a link which is supposed to bring up a
dialog to start the download of the file ofxroots.crt. When I click on this
link, this does not happen. It does not work on NS 4.75, but does work for Win IE.

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1.Point browser to referenced URL
2.Click on link in step 1
3.Nothing further seems to happen

Actual Results:  File save dialog does not appear, so file cannot be downloaded.

Expected Results:  File save dialog should appear so file can be downloaded.
